```{r pancreas 32035641, include=FALSE}

PMID_32035641 <- RefManageR::ReadPubMed('32035641', database = 'PubMed')

citation_32035641 <- paste0(PMID_32035641$journal,' ', PMID_32035641$year, ' ', PMID_32035641$month,';', PMID_32035641$volume,'(', PMID_32035641$number,'):', PMID_32035641$pages)

PubMed_32035641 <- paste0(PubMedString, PMID_32035641$eprint)

doi_32035641 <- paste0(doiString, PMID_32035641$doi)

Sys.sleep(1)

```
